channel.title: Homelab on Hi, I am Peter Lord.
channel.description: Recent content in Homelab on Hi, I am Peter Lord.

item.title: Peter, where have you been?
item.description: Hey y’all - it’s been 1,359 days since my last blog post — feels like a lifetime ago! A lot has since changed. My wife and I welcomed a beautiful baby boy into our family, marking the beginning of an exciting new chapter. Professionally, I have made a leap from front-end development to platform engineering, embracing the vast world of DevOps. This journey took an exciting turn about two years ago when I started working at Lucasfilm.
